en.title: You must find it intolerable to live with your {{ session.divorceWho }}
en.mustBeIntolerable: You must find it intolerable (unbearable) to live with your {{ session.divorceWho }} if you want to use adultery as your reason for divorce. This applies whether you're still living together or not.
en.notIntolerable: If you don't find it intolerable, you'll need to pay a Â£95 fee to change your application and use another reason for divorce. Your application will also need to be sent to your {{ session.divorceWho }} again.
en.contact: Contact your regional divorce centre to change your application, or go back to change your answer.
